name: Armis_RPG_Jam_2023
description:
This is a game submission for the RPG Jam, 2023.

Theme Chosen: NO Items

ARMIS is a game about a desolate world and giant robots. You play as a fleeing pilot, one of many, trying to avoid the wars by holding up in a desert city and earning your keep via battling in mech arena matches. Will you be able to run forever? Or will conflict come to you?

Controls:

Works with Keyboard & Xbox gamepad.

AWSD or Left Stick for movement/menu navigation...

Space Bar or 'A' Button to "confirm/interact"...

I or Start/Menu Button for the in-game menu...

Of Note!

Decided not to go it alone for this jam and acquired assistance for the music.

Music Composed by:  Ashif N

Follow this composer below:

Thank you in advance for playing, and don't be afraid to leave feedback.

**Update**

Due to the issues some have been having with  a straight .exe download, I've changed the downloadable files to a single zip. Inside, there is already a Shortcut to make things simpler. Easy as > just extract > Double click the Shortcut to play.
